entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support registering all runtime signal handlers with `SA_ONSTACK` #110368
    Future
  • Missing documentation for BindingFlags.DoNotWrapExceptions #110366
  • C++/CLI __declspec(appdomain) static variables cause a C++/CLI binary to fail to load. #110365
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Customized date formatting for SmtpClient #110361
    Future
  • MethodInfo.CreateDelegate() creates working delegate but delegate.Method throws #110357
  • ServiceController constructor throws exception with Nuget library 9.0 in .NET6 #110354
    10.0.0
  • Consider adding a telemetry event for failed HTTP connection attempts #110351
  • Process not responsive dump indicates garbage collection #110350
  • SerialPort.ParityReplace not working on Linux #110349
  • Named mutex not working on Linux and MacOS when AOT compiling #110348
  • Assertion failed '!inTry || ((unsigned)(add->acdTryIndex - 1) != XTnum)' during 'Remove empty finally 2' #110346

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add API to enable BackgroundService startup to avoid blocking host startup #36063
    10.0.0
  • Enhance JsonConsoleFormatter to be configurable and avoid to duplicate information #110373
  • Segmentation Fault in libcoreclr Since .Net 8 Upgrade #99151
    Future
  • Deserialize of DateOnly in System.Text.Json 9.0.0 returns incorrect date and year #109892
  • The mask of `shiftAmount` in `IShiftOperators<byte, int, byte>` should be 7 instead of 31 #103506
    10.0.0
  • Reconsider deleting `linux-instructions.md` and related files #110324
    10.0.0
  • Contract-based polymorphic support only sometimes works, depending on casting #109502
  • Loop goes in wrong direction #100825
    10.0.0
  • Publish Failure in .NET 9 RC 2 for Blazor Web App (.NET 8, Auto Render Mode) and Blazor WASM (.NET 8) with Localization #109604
    8.0.x
  • MeterListener can't listen to RuntimeMetrics #110252
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'newLclValue.BothDefined()' during 'Do value numbering' #110306
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `bool TryGetElementAt<T>(this IEnumerable<T>, out T element)` #110338

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix recursion issue found in issue #109779 #110379
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Install zlib in the IlcFrameworkNative folder instead of alongside the runtime #110378
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110377
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [Profiler] Cleanup profiler logic #110376
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [Profiler][Docs] Cleanup Profiler Pinning documentation #110375
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix ACD updates when a non-enclosing EH region is removed #110374
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support generic fields in PersistedAssemblyBuilder #110372
    bug, area-System.Reflection.Emit, 10.0.0
  • Fix C++/CLI applications which use __declspec(appdomain) #110367
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix zlib-ng build with cmake 3.31.0 #110359
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Enable more ILLinker skipped tests on native AOT #110353
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Enhance IV opts relop evaluation to use range check #110352
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the bug within ‘RtlpUnwindFunctionFull()’ when dealing with the ‘end_c’ unwind code. #110347
    community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, needs-area-label
  • Move GetRefAny (with FCThrow) to managed #110344
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ECMA augments regarding instance and type construction. #110343
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Updating xarch to utilize EVEX compares and blending where possible #110342
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • The mask of shift amount in `IShiftOperators<byte, int, byte>` should be 7 #103900
    area-System.Numerics, breaking-change, community-contribution
  • Delete System.Array special case in TryResolveTypeNameForCreateInstanceAndMark #110345
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110211
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Do greedy 4-opt for backward jumps in 3-opt layout #110277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for building with Clang 19 #109198
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.12
  • [manual] Merge release/9.0-staging into release/9.0 #110370
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [Release/8.0] Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #109579
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.12
  • Disable transitions test under GC Stress #109986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix length check for Convert.TryToHexString{Lower} #110228
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Update Azure Linux tag names #110341
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0-staging] Suppress IL3050 warnings in ILLink tests #110340
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix Workflow Broken Markdown Links #110332
    documentation, 10.0.0
  • Fix increment in decreasing loop in non-shipping code #110219
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable more ILLink test cases with native AOT #110166
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid mask<->vector optimization for masks used in unhandled ways #110307
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix `GetHardwareIntrinsicId` on 32bit platforms #110238
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Simplify usage of the installer and shared framework SDKs based on improvements in the tooling #109710
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Only build cdac-build-tool when we need to build runtime #109719
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [draft] Improve startup and warmup performance for invoke by reducing emit usage #109901
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 10.0.0
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • JIT: Use linear block order for MinOpts in LSRA #108147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: enable cloning of try regions #110020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan (Try 2) #109707
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix analyzer tracking of nullable enums #110331
    Servicing-consider, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2594336 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cDAC] Implement GCCover portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #110322
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove .NET Framework-era remoteable wait subsystem #109754
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Help finding Brotli headers when doing VMR build under FreeBSD #110079
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • JIT_CountProfile: Avoid BSR instruction for low counts #110258
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Re-try loading ENGINE keys with a non-NULL UI_METHOD #109783
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Re-try loading ENGINE keys with a non-NULL UI_METHOD #109782
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [debugger] Support step into a tail call #110334
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Always aggressively compact blocks #109521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • More WriteGather fixes #109826
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • Warn on method access in Requires analyzers #110086
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/9.0] Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #110163
    Servicing-consider, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix return address hijacking with CET #109548
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable Arm64 RDM on Windows #109493
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update to .NET 10 build images #110198
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Warn on message formatting failure instead of crash, and fix Native AOT MakeGenericType failure #110330
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Fix comments in AggregateException.GetBaseException() #107743
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix Configuration to throw with ErrorOnUnknownConfiguration option #110209
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 10.0.0
  • Fix UNC paths #110033
    area-Host
  • JIT: Allow strength reducing to GCD of IVs #110222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Implement ReJIT portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #109936
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add vector support to System.Numerics.Tensors.TensorPrimitives.LeadingZeroCount for Byte and Int16 #110333
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use static project from assets or `dotnet new`, unification of browser tests #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/9.0-staging] ILC: Allow OOB reference to upgrade framework assembly #110058
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.1
  • Remove ConcurrentDictionary lookups from Unix socket event loop #109052
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 10.0.0
  • Check loaded in dac values to avoid SIGSEGV on null pointers #110303
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono][sgen] Add separate card mark function to be used with debug #110268
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][sgen] Add separate card mark function to be used with debug #110269
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono][aot] Fix compilation crashes when type load exception is generated in code #110271
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add support for emitting Source Link data #110270
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • New GC decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
